name: A Lawful Neutral Vampire at His Majesty's Royal Donut Drop
name_original: A Lawful Neutral Vampire at His Majesty's Royal Donut Drop
description:
You are a vampire who would be king.  If only you can collect 36 donuts falling from the sky.  Easy enough, right?

A silly little game made in DragonRuby for the 20 Second Game Jam.  How many of the optional themes could I use?  Let's find out.

controls:

RIGHT/LEFT or A/D to move
UP or W to use your parasol.
